original_title: Nossa Pátria Está Onde Somos Amados
overview: Brazil is huge, made of an extremely colorful mix of races, origins, ideas and cultures. Now it has come to a boil: the country torn apart by political, and religious conflicts, our forests burnt down and razed to the ground, "minorities" persecuted, and part of the population arming itself on the expectation of something wicked coming our way in the most polarized election ever.
title: Nossa Pátria Está Onde Somos Amados
